verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: only a liar] , but he 's a bad one at that . Earlier this week the president received a mysterious letter from the North Korean regime .
Donald Trump is n't only a liar , but [ARG1: he] [V: 's] [ARG2: a bad one at that] . Earlier this week the president received a mysterious letter from the North Korean regime .
Donald Trump is n't only a liar , but he 's a bad one at that . [ARGM-TMP: Earlier this week] [ARG0: the president] [V: received] [ARG1: a mysterious letter] [ARG2: from the North Korean regime] .
